title: WHIRLING F1 / orb communist quest
description: Orb for wondering whether the Hardies are a communist cell. PART OF THE COMMUNIST DREAM QUEST.

dialogueTree.title: Rhetoric: "Wait... No, something about this bu..."
dialogueTree.text: Wait... No, something about this bunch doesn't smell right...

links.title: You: "What do you mean? Aren't they Evrar..."
links.text: What do you mean? Aren't they Evrart's guys?

links.title: Rhetoric: "They are, but they don't seem too k..."
links.text: They are, but they don't seem too keen to talk with you, do they?

links.title: Glen: "No, they don't. Glen seems to be co..."
links.text: No, they don't. Glen seems to be contemplating grievous bodily harm while he massages his raw knuckles...

links.title: Eugene: "In the far back, Eugene is doing hi..."
links.text: In the far back, Eugene is doing his best to ignore you...

links.title: Fat Angus: "Meanwhile, Fat Angus keeps shooting..."
links.text: Meanwhile, Fat Angus keeps shooting you furtive glances and mumbling uneasily to himself...

links.title: Titus Hardie: "And from his perch at the end of th..."
links.text: And from his perch at the end of the table, Titus Hardie himself stares at you with a cold contempt that makes you want to leave the cafeteria straightaway.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Besides, you're pretty sure they co..."
links.text: Besides, you're pretty sure they consider themselves social democrats.

links.title: You: "What do you mean? Who are they?"
links.text: What do you mean? Who are they?

links.title: Shanky: "A little man, hardly bigger than a..."
links.text: A little man, hardly bigger than a child, with a lean, hateful face...

links.title: Alain: "You've seen the expression on this..."
links.text: You've seen the expression on this one's face before, on a dozen hardened thieves and killers...

links.title: Fat Angus: "Meanwhile, the fat one keeps shooti..."
links.text: Meanwhile, the fat one keeps shooting you furtive looks while mumbling uneasily to himself...

links.title: Titus Hardie: "And here, guarding the entrance to..."
links.text: And here, guarding the entrance to his den, the undisputed alpha wolf, radiating contempt for you and all you represent.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You may not know them, but they see..."
links.text: You may not know them, but they seem to know exactly who *you* are...

links.title: You: "Alright, guess I'll look elsewhere..."
links.text: Alright, guess I'll look elsewhere then. [Leave.]
